testcase.name: Given the pending change request "Fault" in a list of pending requests(Scenario: accept a change request
When I accept it with priority "high" for developer "Alice" with deadline "17-11-2015"(Scenario: accept a change request
Then I should see the next pending request (if any)(Scenario: accept a change request
Given the pending change request "New Feature" in a list of pending requests(Scenario: reject a change request
When I reject it with explanation "feature already considered in the new release candidate"(Scenario: reject a change request
Then I should see the next pending request (if any)(Scenario: reject a change request
Given I am logged in as "Alice"(Scenario: process a change request
And an approved change request "Fault"(Scenario: process a change request
When I complete the task with data "15-11-2015"(Scenario: process a change request
Then I should get the next approved request allocated to me(Scenario: process a change request
Given a SCI "SCI_1"(Scenario: report a fault
And a head version "version_2"(Scenario: report a fault
Given a problem description "Fault"(Scenario: report a fault
And a proposed solution "Missing dependency"(Scenario: report a fault
When I request a change request for reporting a fault(Scenario: report a fault
And shows a summary of the change request(Scenario: report a fault
Given a SCI "SCI_1"(Scenario: request a new feature
And a head version "version_2"(Scenario: request a new feature
Given a problem description "New Feature"(Scenario: request a new feature
And a proposed solution "Extension of Module A"(Scenario: request a new feature
When I request a new feature(Scenario: request a new feature
Then The system shows a summary of the change request(Scenario: request a new feature
